title: Space Science Fiction Music Pack
description: 15 orchestral and synth-heavy hybrid music pieces, 60 files.
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


Space Science Fiction Music Pack is a collection of 15 orchestral and synth-heavy hybrid music pieces written for space and science fiction games. The music covers a wide range of emotions, from bright and positive to dark and grim moods; but all with the same instrumentation. 

Each piece has two different arrangements; one labeled as “Ambient”, with only string section, brass section and synths; and the second arrangement labeled as “Action” with and added percussion section to fit more action oriented moments (both arrangements are crossfaded on the sample track).


This pack includes 15 tracks, each with an “Ambient” and an “Action” arrangements, and “Loop” edit of both arrangements; which adds to 60 music files.

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  15 High quality orchestral/synth hybrid ambient tracks
  •  15 High quality orchestral/synth hybrid ambient loop edits
  •  15 High quality orchestral/synth and percussion hybrid action tracks
  • 15 High quality orchestral/synth and percussion hybrid action loop edits


Number of Audio Wavs: 60

Number of Audio Cues: 60

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 66:08 (including loop edits)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
